message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I believe will be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $10000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product might be high to you, but I am looking for a lower price. Would you consider selling the product for $8000?
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  I appreciate you recognizing the value of the product.  While $8000 is my minimum, I'm willing to meet you halfway for now.  How about $9000?
